data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 5, Juventus's Blaise Matuidi has run offside.
Throw-in Juventus.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Juventus's half.
In the minute 7, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 10, Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Attention is being given to Sampdoriaâ€™s Julian Chabot and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 12, Julian Chabot is back on his feet again.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Sampdoria's Karol Linetty gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau blows against Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo for offside.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 19, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria drive forward but Fabio Depaoli is judged offside.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 21, Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Julian Chabot, who is grimacing with pain.
Mehdi Leris (Sampdoria) has replaced the possibly injured Julian Chabot.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Juventus in the half of Sampdoria.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau waits before resuming play because Gaston Ramirez for Sampdoria is still down.
In the minute 25, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Danilo for Juventus who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
It seems as if Danilo is unable to continue. Federico Bernardeschi replaces him for the home team.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 30, Paulo Dybala for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus are coming forward and Federico Bernardeschi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 35, Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella is on target but unsuccessful.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In Turin Sampdoria drive forward through Fabio Quagliarella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Juventus are pushing forward but Juan Cuadrado's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 39, Francesco Fourneau awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
The match at Allianz Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Paulo Dybala, who is down injured.
Maurizio Sarri (Juventus) has taken off Paulo Dybala who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Gonzalo Higuain is the replacement.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Juventus's Federico Bernardeschi gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Sampdoria.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Juventus just outside Sampdoria's area.
Juventus's Federico Bernardeschi breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 45, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Can Juventus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Turin.
Miralem Pjanic is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) has received a yellow card from Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 45, At Allianz Stadium, Lorenzo Tonelli has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Juventus have got their heads in front thanks to a Cristiano Ronaldo strike.
Great play from Miralem Pjanic to set up the goal.
The second half has started at Allianz Stadium.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 49, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Juventus.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 51, Mehdi Leris of Sampdoria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Francesco Fourneau awards Juventus a goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Juventus's half.
In the minute 52, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Juventus.
Sampdoria pushes forward through Gaston Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In Turin, Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Juventus.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 56, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gaston Ramirez (Sampdoria) strikes at Allianz Stadium but his header is cleared.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Sampdoria's area.
In the minute 60, Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cristiano Ronaldo for Juventus drives towards goal at Allianz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 63, Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 65, Jakub Jankto for Sampdoria has been booked by Francesco Fourneau and receives a first yellow card.
Federico Bernardeschi puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 68, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
In the minute 69, Free kick Sampdoria.
Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) gets a yellow card.
In Turin, Fabio Quagliarella (Sampdoria) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 71, Gaston Ramirez of Sampdoria gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
The away team have replaced Jakub Jankto with Manolo Gabbiadini. This is the second substitution made today by Claudio Ranieri.
In the minute 75, Sampdoria drive upfield and Manolo Gabbiadini gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juventus defender.
Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Matthijs De Ligt has recovered and rejoins the match in Turin.
Matthijs De Ligt is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 78, Attention is being given to Juventusâ€™s Matthijs De Ligt and play has been suspended briefly.
Daniele Rugani (Juventus) has replaced the possibly injured Matthijs De Ligt at Allianz Stadium.
Maurizio Sarri is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Stadium with Rodrigo Bentancur replacing Miralem Pjanic.
In the minute 79, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Juventus's Juan Cuadrado has been booked in Turin.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Juventus defence as Fabio Quagliarella fires in a strike for Sampdoria.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Juventus are coming forward and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 83, Francesco Fourneau awards Juventus a goal kick.
Sampdoria's Manolo Gabbiadini attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 86, Juventus have a goal kick.
Juventus's Adrien Rabiot has been booked in Turin and will miss the next match through suspension.
Gaston Ramirez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 88, Juventus have been given a penalty at Allianz Stadium...
Fabio Depaoli (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
Francesco Fourneau awards Juventus a penalty but Cristiano Ronaldo misses from 12 yards.
Cristiano Ronaldo hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Juventus in Turin.
In the minute 89, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez is back in action after a slight knock.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Juventus drives forward and Adrien Rabiot gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Leonardo Bonucci gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sampdoria defence.
In Turin Juventus attack through Gonzalo Higuain. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Gaston Ramirez (Sampdoria) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Gonzalo Maroni.
